name: Mini Island: Cosmos
description:
Welcome to Mini Island!

Mini Island: Cosmos is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!
This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame!

More About & Features

  • Casual difficulty
  • Hold & Gun and Boss Rush
  • Simple Hit & Dodge Style Action.
  • 4 types of 16 playable characters.
  • 13 stages with 72 boss fights.
  • Colorful and sparkling art graphics.
  • 20 minutes to 35 minutes playtime (7 Stage)
  • 60 minutes to 100 minutes playtime (13 Stage)
